mapper.sql: id, budget_time_type, user_uuid, category_name, summary_amount, home_currency, start_date, end_date, gmt_create, gmt_modified
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bill_income_summary (budget_time_type, user_uuid, category_name, summary_amount, home_currency, start_date, end_date, gmt_create, gmt_modified) VALUES (#{budgetTimeType}, #{userUuid}, #{categoryName}, #{summaryAmount}, #{homeCurrency}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, now(), now()) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE summary_amount = summary_amount + #{summaryAmount}, gmt_modified = now()
